statements: SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_location, participant_id FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location, participant_id, event_id FROM Events;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE participant_id = 100;
SELECT event_name FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_location, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM Events GROUP BY event_name, event_location;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND participant_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name FROM Events WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Exhibitions WHERE sculptor_name = 'Michaelangelo';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Exhibitions WHERE exhibition_location = 'Paris' ORDER BY exhibition_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_id IN (SELECT exhibition_id FROM Exhibitions WHERE sculptor_name = 'Michelangelo');
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events JOIN Exhibitions ON Events.event_id = Exhibitions.exhibition_id WHERE Events.event_location != 'London';
SELECT * FROM Events JOIN Exhibitions ON Events.event_id = Exhibitions.exhibition_id WHERE Events.event_date < '2022-10-01' AND Exhibitions.exhibition_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist, material FROM Sculptures;
SELECT participant_name, organization FROM Participants;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location, organizer FROM Events;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist, material FROM Sculptures WHERE year_created > 2000;
SELECT participant_name, organization, event_name FROM Participants p JOIN Events e ON p.event_id = e.event_id;
SELECT event_name, location, organizer FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sculptures WHERE sculpture_material = 'Bronze';
SELECT participant_name, participant_type FROM Participants WHERE participant_type = 'Artist';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT sculpture_name, sculptor_name, sculpture_material FROM Sculptures WHERE sculpture_material = 'Marble';
SELECT participant_name, participant_type FROM Participants WHERE participant_type = 'Artist' ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Events JOIN Event_Participants ON Events.event_id = Event_Participants.event_id WHERE participant_id = 1;

SELECT event_name, event_location, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM Events JOIN Event_Participants ON Events.event_id = Event_Participants.event_id GROUP BY event_id HAVING COUNT(participant_id) > 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT exhibition_name, location, start_date FROM Exhibitions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist, material FROM Sculptures WHERE year_created BETWEEN 1800 AND 1900;
SELECT participant_name, email, role FROM Participants WHERE role = 'Artist' ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, phone_number, role FROM Participants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY participant_name;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events WHERE organizer = 'Art Association' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sculptures WHERE year_created BETWEEN 1800 AND 1900 ORDER BY material ASC, sculpture_name;
SELECT exhibition_name, location, end_date FROM Exhibitions WHERE start_date >= '2022-06-01' AND start_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_name, email, role FROM Participants WHERE role IN ('Artist', 'Critic')
